metric_definitions.transliteration_success: Accuracy from run_eval(dataset='golden_translit'): expected Gujlish->Gujarati outputs matched on the packaged golden set.
metric_definitions.dialect_accuracy: Accuracy from run_eval(dataset='dialect_id', dialect_backend='heuristic') on the packaged dialect-id set.
metric_definitions.p95_latency_ms: 95th percentile single-input pipeline latency (milliseconds) over a fixed representative sample set.
